data.title: Greg Davies
data.meta_description: Greg Davies is a British stand-up comedian and actor. He is best known for his roles in BBC Three sketch show We Are Klang, E4 sitcom The Inbetweeners (and subsequent movie adaptions), BBC Three sitcom Cuckoo, and Channel 4 sitcom Man Down. He has also appeared on Mock the Week, Would I Lie to...
data.text:
“ Hello I am Greg Davies and this is Taskmaster. In this show I, Greg Davies, makes some accomplished but needy comedians do stupid things for me. Why? Because I can. I'm a powerful man. Look at me. Thank you. They have no idea how each other did but they will soon find out. I should be judging both what they did and how they did it. My word is final. The contestants will definitely respect me. ” - Greg Davies Melon buffet.

Greg Davies is a British stand-up comedian and actor. He is best known for his roles in BBC Three sketch show We Are Klang, E4 sitcom The Inbetweeners (and subsequent movie adaptions), BBC Three sitcom Cuckoo, and Channel 4 sitcom Man Down. He has also appeared on Mock the Week, Would I Lie to You? and Live at the Apollo.

Since 2015, Davies has hosted Taskmaster, in the titular role, alongside his assistant Alex Horne. Davies acts as judge, making the final decision on the awarding of points, as well as any disqualifications.

He was the guest on episodes 11 and 134 of Taskmaster The Podcast and episodes 24 and 34 of Taskmaster: The People's Podcast.

Video[]

Trivia[]

Davies was also the Taskmaster for the Edinburgh Does... Taskmaster show.

Davies made a cameo in Brynley Stent's prize task for the episode An Intervention. of Taskmaster NZ.

Davies made a surprise appearance at Max and Ivan's 'The Wrestling' comedy show on 5th March 2023, as Greg 'The Taskmaster' Davies, fighting Rosie Jones in an impromptu match.
